009package imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay;
010
011import java.util.List;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014
015/**
016 * Interface specification for various implementations of the
017 * Delaunay triangulation.
018 */
019public interface DelaunayTriangulation {
020        
021        /**
022         * Returns a list of 2D triangles (implementing the {@link Triangle} interface) 
023         * contained in this triangulation. The list does not contain the initial outer 
024         * triangle.
025         * @return a list of triangles 
026         */
027        List<Triangle> getTriangles();
028        
029        /**
030         * Returns a list of 2D vertices (implementing the {@link Pnt2d} interface)
031         * contained in this triangulation. The sequence of points is assumed
032         * to be in the order of their actual insertion. The list does not contain the
033         * vertices of the initial (outer) triangle.
034         * @return a list of points
035         */
036        List<Pnt2d> getPoints();
037
038}
